TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 445
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Texas Gazette, 07-10-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Article by Austin in Texas Gazette, July 10, 1830. Explaining recent revolution in Mexico and reassuring the Texans. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 445

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Article by Austin in Texas Gazette, July 10, 1830. Explaining recent revolution in Mexico and reassuring the Texans. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[Texas Gazette, July 10, 1830. Political conditions in Mexico becoming more tranquil. Cordial attitude toward the United States. Omitted.]*/p*
*/div1*
